game.name: Pawnbroker Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Pawnbroker Simulator, where you're the boss. Build your shop, strike deals, and test your business savvy in this indie simulation game. Dive into a world of trade and management. Can you make it big in the world of pawnbroking? Time to find out!
